SELECT PM.PRJT_FAV, P.PRJT_NO , COUNT(P.PRJT_NO) AS count, P.PRJT_NM,P.PRJT_TDT, P.PRJT_FDT, P.PRJT_ST FROM PROJECT_MEMBER PM, PROJECT P WHERE PM.PRJT_NO = P.PRJT_NO
GROUP BY PM.PRJT_FAV, P.PRJT_NO, P.PRJT_NM,P.PRJT_TDT, P.PRJT_FDT, P.PRJT_ST ORDER BY PRJT_FAV DESC

SELECT PM.PRJT_FAV, P.PRJT_NO , COUNT(P.PRJT_NO) AS count, P.PRJT_NM,P.PRJT_TDT, P.PRJT_FDT, P.PRJT_ST FROM PROJECT_MEMBER PM, PROJECT P WHERE PM.PRJT_NO = P.PRJT_NO AND PRJT_ST = #{prjtSt}
GROUP BY PM.PRJT_FAV, P.PRJT_NO, P.PRJT_NM,P.PRJT_TDT, P.PRJT_FDT, P.PRJT_ST ORDER BY PRJT_FAV DESC
